channel.title: CVE Feed for elementinvader -- ElementInvader Addons for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for elementinvader -- ElementInvader Addons for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-9889|2024-10-21T15:19:50.268Z -- elementinvader -- elementinvader%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The ElementInvader Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.9 via the Page Loader widget. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to view private/draft/password protected posts, pages, and Elementor templates that they should not have access to.

item.title: CVE-2024-9888|2024-10-16T16:10:45.410Z -- elementinvader -- elementinvader%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The ElementInvader Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's contact form widget redirect URL in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.8 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-47630|2024-10-07T13:19:48.430Z -- elementinvader -- elementinvader%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ElementInvader ElementInvader Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ElementInvader Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.2.7.
